wiki & bio: Sir Henri-Gustave Joly de Lotbinière.born as Henry-Gustave Joly

bio: baptized Henry-Charles-Wilfrid. In 1905, ran for both Quebec East and Wright, and resigned from the latter, sitting for Quebec East only. In 1911, ran for both Quebec East and Soulanges, and sat for both ridings.
In 1905, ran for both Gaspé and Nicolet, was elected in both, and resigned from the latter.
